shit game blantenly steals from their remaining player base by charging 3 times more for a "operation" that adds zero content and also doesnt fix anything we have been asking for, for the last 6 months. not only that but then the "content" that was released is them literally begging you to play their dying game with the dumbest possible missions. Such as tactically smoke a main or appartments 5 times in a casual match, or you can play a deathmatch game and get 25 shotgun kills for a 3 star mission... thanks valve
